text: Michel Piccoli (27 December 1925 - 12 May 2020) was a French actor, director, singer, musician, and screenwriter. He was known for his roles in Belle de Jour, Atlantic City, La Belle Noiseuse, and in We Have a Pope. Piccoli was born in Paris, France. Piccoli died on 12 May 2020 in Cannes of a stroke, aged 94.È morto Michel Piccoli, attore europeo per Godard, Buñuel e Nanni Moretti ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:French movie actors Category:French screenwriters Category:Singers from Paris Category:Musicians from Paris Category:Writers from Paris Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Actors from Paris
title: Michel Piccoli
